1: Living truth endures from the beginning, visible, audible, and tangible.
2: Revealed life brings shared eternal life.
3: Sharing lived truth builds fellowship with one another and the Divine.
4: Words of guidance make your joy complete.
5: Pure light shines everywhere with perfect clarity
6: Walk in the light to live truthful fellowship.
7: Walking in light brings shared fellowship and ongoing inner purity.
8: Honest self-awareness fills life with truth.
9: I confess honestly and receive complete forgiveness and cleansing.
10: Honest acknowledgment lets truth live within us.
